item.description:
The Players’ Ring continues its 20th season: 

2046 Productions and Matt Kingsbury presents

Detritus     by Sean Baptiste. Directed by Joi Smith.

The return of the 2001 Spotlight Award-winning play "Detritus" by Sean Baptiste to the Players' Ring!

"One Man's journey into the past to find the father that he never knew."


Starring Will MacDonald, Matthew Schofield, Todd Hunter, Whitney Smith and Angelina MacDonald.


 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ri~Ra Irish Pub  Meet @ 6pm for drinks & dinner. 

...let me know if you're coming so I can reserve a table.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tickets: Only $12 each with the Seacoast Outdoors discount!

Arrive @ the theater 7:30, show begins @ 8pm. 

Reserve by phone at 603/ 436*8123 and say you're with  Seacoast Outdoors Meetup to receive a discount.  Then pay at the door. Or, buy tickets online.  These shows do sell out so make sure you reserve!

The Players' Ring Theater -  Since 1992, the mission of The Players' Ring has been to promote the efforts of local artists through the production of original works, while providing an affordable theatre space to local production companies.

“The Ring” as we know and love it, nurtures all artists and provides an environment where artists can thrive, grow, take risks and make daring choices. The Players' Ring is located in a nineteenth century brick building on Marcy Street on the grounds of Prescott Park in Portsmouth, New Hampshire.

The historic building is owned by the City of Portsmouth and is fitted out as a “black box” theatre. With a seating capacity of 75, The Players' Ring annual attendance is approximately 6,500. Since its creation, more than 30 local production companies have presented plays at The Players' Ring. While some form to produce a single special event, some production companies produce shows on an annual basis. Over 200 actors, directors, playwrights and technicians work together to produce plays at The Players' Ring each year. Over the past five years, over $180,000 has been distributed to those involved in Players' Ring productions. Original works account for half of each season’s offerings.


Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Participation in this activity is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment. 

*Unless otherwise specified, refunds for timely cancellations will be processed the day after the event.

*Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Detritus @ The Players' Ring
